item.title: Issue #2254 created
item.description:
Editorial: nevertheless as one word

I've never seen "never the less" as a three-word phrase. I think it should be written as a single word (unless the three-word form is typical of British English...).

https://github.com/qt4cg/qtspecs/blob/fc93d95f51338cb51d2d3652da026f18359e881f/specifications/xpath-datamodel-40/src/xpath-datamodel.xml#L1071
